title: Beautiful 3BD next to UC Berkeley! 2 months Rent Free!
posting_body: ['2510 Bancroft #204 Berkeley, CA 94704', 'Please text Maddalena', 'show contact info', 'for fastest response', 'MOVE IN OFFER: *Now Offering 2 Months Free on select units for A limited time!*', 'Located on the corner of Bancroft and Telegraph, 2510 Bancroft is situated at the center of UC Berkeley campus action!', 'Less than 1 block from UC Berkeley, residents happily commute to campus and downtown Berkeley with ease.', 'Popular restaurants, shopping, and nightlife are at your fingertips in this unbeatable Berkeley location.', 'The apartments include high ceilings and large windows, providing an abundance of natural light and outstanding views of UC Berkeley campus.', 'This rental community is pet-friendly, welcoming both cats and dogs at no extra charge.', 'Unit Features:', '-Light, Bright Finishes', '-Dishwasher', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Pet-friendly; no pet rent', 'Other:', '-10 or 12-month lease', '-Flexible terms, Semester or 9 to 12 months!', 'Contact:', 'Maddalena McKenzie']
